attributes.action: To change our current house purchase law
attributes.additional_details:
To eliminate the practice of gazumping.
In addition, to eliminate a purchaser wasting thousands of pounds on a house purchase when the sellar backs out of a deal last minute.
attributes.background: To change our current law in which sellers can drop out at the last minute resulting in financial loss for the buyer having had paid solicitors, surveyors and other fee's which they may incur. This would also prevent gazumping.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/611430
